Title: Let's Give the Boy a Hand
Plot: The Ice Truck Killer begins leaving pictures from Dexter's childhood at the crime scenes. Is the killer trying to tell Dexter something about his own past?
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Alex Wexo, Laura Marano, German Legarreta, Haley King, Monique Curnen, Brad Henke, Rudolf Martin, Elena Maria Garcia, Alden McKay, Connor Matheus, Ashton  Moio, Francisco Viana, Nick Simmons, Kathrin Lautner Middl
